sayitam aayathanayata wiruddhawa udghoshana kala wishwa widyala sisunta rajaya wisin pahara di thuwala sidu kirima saha ath adanguwata ganima, waidya sabhawata bomba praharaya ella kirima, sayitam aayathanaye hitapu widhaya adhyaksha samira senarathna mahathata wedi thabime jawanikawa pitupasa sitina pudgalayinta nithiya kriyathmaka nokirima, wruththiya samithi nayakayin mardanaya kirima sandaha rajaya gena yana wada piliwela ha sayitam aayathanaye sisunge puhunuwa sandaha rajaye rohal laba dimata saukhya amathyanshaya gena thibena thiranayan ta wirodhaya pala karamin mema sanketha wada warjanaya pawathwana bawa hethema pawasiya.
